title: Call screening disappeared on my fully patch Pixel 3a ... AGAIN
content:
A previous Phone App version killed my 'Call Screening'.  Then a later app restored that function.

Now it has disappeared again.  I can't even add the phone app version number as it only shows up on recent updates. 

The Android operating system is a joke.  In theory with a Pixel 3a fully patched, I should have no issues, and I can't even use it as a phone.
